page.title: 12Health In Paulerspury
page.content: There has been a doctor's surgery in Paulerspury for forty years or more. For many years it was in Dr Read's house in the High Street. The present surgery in Lumber Lane was built in 1968. It has three receptionists one of whom is part-time, one midwife and one health-visitor who runs a baby clinic. The four Doctors in the practice are Drs. Lewis, Kelso, Hooker and Sunderland. Dr hooker lives in the village. The local practice covers the following places: Towcester, Alderton, Paulerspury, Cosgrove, Deanshanger, Grafton Regis, Lillingstone Lovel, Old Stratford, Potterspury, Pury End, Stoke Bruerne, Shutlanger, Wicken and Yardley Gobion.
